text:
Good Afternoon/Morning Everyone :coffee:

:new: :alert: :new: :alert: :new: :alert: :new: :alert: :new: :alert: :new: :alert: :new: :alert: :new: :alert: :new: :alert:

Guess what? We've just launched our `new Developer Documentation site` into public beta! :rocket: I can't wait for you to get your hands on this.

You can check it out by <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/|visiting this link>. :click:

Here are some of the significant improvements we've made:
• Single source of truth across all of HubSpot's public APIs and each of their versions
• Overhauled search
• New design language 
• Holistic information architecture restructure 
• Responsively designed from the ground up
• New content for getting started
• Linking to individual endpoints
And so much more! We’d love for you to share with any HubSpot builder you know. Follow along and provide feedback over in <#C06S581J2AZ|developer-docs-beta>
